BBSRC-HGCA Black-grass Resistance Initiative

Unravelling herbicide resistance in black-grass from gene to field

On July 16th, the BGRI team will be in Harrogate for a Farmer-Scientist Network hosted Black-grass seminar. The session will be chaired by Rob Edwards, and will include contributions from other BGRI members Paul Neve and Rob Freckleton. Come along to learn more about the BGRI's research, and to discuss the opportunities and challenges in controlling this weed.

Unimaginatively constructed with jekyll and bootstrap.
